question_text: A user selects a 1200W power supply for a 350W system. Which TWO of the following risks or inefficiencies may occur? (Select two)
answer_options: Excessive heat generation at low load
Wasted energy from low efficiency curve
correct_answer: Wasted energy from low efficiency curve
explanation: Large PSUs running at very low load may operate outside their peak efficiency range and may have higher base power draw.
